formatted_address: 37&39, Jalan Eko Botani 3/7 Taman Eko Botani Iskandar Puteri, 79100 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Beer Mad Eco Botanic City

reviews.text:
The ambiance was quite noisy, with a loud band playing, making it not an ideal spot to relax.

As for the food, we tried the pasta with lamb chop and the fish & chips.
•	Fish & Chips: The fish and sauce were delicious, but the coleslaw fell short—too crunchy due to the shredded cabbage and lacking enough dressing.
•	Carbonara Pasta with Lamb Chop: The pasta sauce was overly watery, and the lamb chop was undercooked and chewy (as shown in the picture). Definitely not recommended.

A decent place to chill and relax, family friendly at earlier hours as the place serves quite a good range of dishes from Asian and Western.

Many families with young children are there enjoying the food and drinks for adults. House music is pleasant with popular sing-along songs.

Tried their signature pork burger. Fries are made fresh (plus point). House happy hour beer was served ice cold (plus point).

Beer Mad Eco Botanic City takes pride in its impressive selection of craft beers, showcasing local and international brews. With a rotating tap list, visitors can discover new flavors and styles, from hoppy IPAs to rich stouts and refreshing lagers. The knowledgeable staff are happy to guide you through the menu, helping you find the perfect pint to suit your taste.

Beer Mad Eco Botanic City offers a one-of-a-kind experience, blending craft beer, sustainability, and community spirit. Whether you're a local or visiting Johor Bahru, this hidden gem is definitely worth exploring.

Scrumptious food had served with a lot of local and western varieties. Well prepared and served as per our request and requirement. Loved to have my fav Kilkenny Irish Cream ale..wow what a taste, now days hard to ir locally, which some good about this restaurant.

lavishly designed and built restaurant, clean and neat environment. Enjoyed the moment with lobed one ❤️.

Good crowd and must revisit again thie permises if time granted..

Here with friend for dinner, it was our very first time, they served Chinese and western food. And the beer option was okay. The bar design were pretty great. Clean and new. They weren’t busy at the normal day, so i enjoy that a little but more, people aren’t going crazy.

vicinity: 37&39, Jalan Eko Botani 3/7 Taman Eko Botani Iskandar Puteri, Johor Bahru
